alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:38PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison Parish, central Warren and south central Issaquena Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Eagle Bend, or 9 miles northwest of Vicksburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Redwood and Bovina around 215 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mound and Delta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
